metadata.title: CVE-2020-25626 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Django REST Framework versions before 3.12.0 and before3.11.2. When using the browseable API viewer, Django REST Framework failsto properly escape certain strings that can come from user input. Thisallows a user who can control those strings to inject malicious <script>tags, leading to a cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

criterions.comment: djangorestframework package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
